content: crochet pattern to make your own realistic rat the pattern is availiable in one pdf file using us crochet terminology you might need to have some basic experience in making of amiguruni toys i have added a lot of photos in order to make the process more clear and illustrative please feel free to sell itmes you make from this pattern but please make sure you reference my name as designer of the pattern when sharing your creation you must specify my name as the author
